eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils

Class Assistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils.Assistant

  • public class Assistant
extends Object
    Assistance class with various helper methods used in transformation or reverse transformation.
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

      • getRDFSerialization

        Determines the serialization mode in the output RDF triples. Applicable in the RML transformation mode.
        Parameters:
        serialization - A string with the user-specified serialization.
        Returns:
        The RDFFormat to be used in the serialization.

        Parameters:
        serialization - A string with the user-specified serialization.
        Returns:
        The RIOT language to be used in the serialization.

      • notifyProgress

      • reportStatistics

        public void reportStatistics(long dt,
                             int numRec,
                             int numTriples,
                             String serialization,
                             Map<String,Integer> attrStatistics,
                             String mode,
                             String outputFile)
        Report statistics upon termination of the transformation process.
        Parameters:
        dt - The clock time (in milliseconds) elapsed since the start of transformation process.
        numRec - The total number of records that have been processed.
        numTriples - The number of RDF triples resulted from transformation.
        serialization - A string with the user-specified serialization of output triples.
        attrStatistics - Statistics collected per attribute during transformation.
        mode - Transformation mode, as specified in the configuration.
        outputFile - Path to the output file containing the RDF triples.

      • removeDirectory

        public String removeDirectory(String path)
        Removes all files from a given directory. Used for removing intermediate files created during transformation.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the directory.
        Returns:
        The path to a temporary directory that holds intermediate files.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:
        path - The path to the directory.
        Returns:
        The path to a temporary directory that holds intermediate files.

                           String xsltPath,
                           String resultPath)
        Simple transformation method using Saxon XSLT 2.0 processor.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Absolute path to source GML file.
        xsltPath - Absolute path to XSLT file.
        resultPath - Absolute path to the resulting RDF file.

        Updates the MBR of the geographic dataset as this is being transformed.
        Parameters:
        g - Geometry that will be checked for possible expansion of the MBR of all features processed thus far

        Transforms a WKT representation of a geometry into another CRS (reprojection).
        Parameters:
        wkt - Input geometry in Well-Known Text.
        transform - Parameters for the transformation, including source and target CRS.
        Returns:
        WKT of the transformed geometry.

                                                               int srid)
        Reprojects a given geometry into the WGS84 (lon/lat) coordinate reference system
        Parameters:
        wkt - Well-Known Text of the input geometry
        srid - EPSG code of the coordinate reference system (CRS) of the geometry
        Returns:
        Geometry reprojected into WG84 system

        Parameters:

        srid - EPSG code of the coordinate reference system (CRS) of the geometry

                       org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransform transform)
        Transforms a BLOB representation of a geometry contained in an ESRI personal geodatabase (.mdb) into WKT.
        Parameters:
        blob - Input geometry BLOB
        transform - Parameters for the (optional) transformation, including source and target CRS
        Returns:
        the WKT of the transformed geometry

      • geomValidate

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry geomValidate(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry geom)
        Get / create a valid version of the geometry given. If the geometry is a polygon or multi polygon, self intersections / inconsistencies are fixed. Otherwise the geometry is returned.
        Parameters:
        geom -
        Returns:
        a geometry

                                                              com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory factory)
        Get a geometry from a collection of polygons.
        Parameters:
        polygons - collection
        factory - factory to generate MultiPolygon if required
        Returns:
        null if there were no polygons, the polygon if there was only one, or a MultiPolygon containing all polygons otherwise

      • geometry2WKT

        public String geometry2WKT(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry g,
                           String geomOntology)
        Provides the Well-Known Text representation of a geometry for its inclusion as literal in RDF triples.
        Parameters:
        g - Input geometry $param geomOntology RDF ontology used in geometry representations (GeoSPARQL, Virtuoso geometry RDF, or WGS84 Geoposition RDF vocabulary)
        Returns:
        WKT of the geometry

        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the geometry
        Returns:

      • getArea

        public static double getArea(String polygonWKT)
        Returns the area of a polygon geometry from its the Well-Known Text representation.
        Parameters:
        polygonWKT - WKT of the polygon
        Returns:
        calculated area (in the same units as the CRS of the geometry)

      • getArea

        public double getArea(String polygonWKT,
                      int targetSRID)
        Built-in function that returns the area of a polygon geometry from its the Well-Known Text representation.
        Parameters:
        polygonWKT - WKT of the polygon
        targetSRID - EPSG code of the coordinate reference system (CRS) of the geometry
        Returns:
        calculated area in square meters (NOT in the units of the CRS of the geometry)

      • getLength

        public static double getLength(String wkt)
        Returns the length of a linestring or the perimeter of a polygon geometry from its the Well-Known Text representation.
        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the linestring or polygon
        Returns:
        calculated length/perimeter (in the same units as the CRS of the geometry)

      • getLength

        public double getLength(String wkt,
                        int targetSRID)
        Built-in function that returns the length of a linestring or the perimeter of a polygon geometry from its the Well-Known Text representation.
        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the linestring or polygon
        targetSRID - EPSG code of the coordinate reference system (CRS) of the geometry
        Returns:
        calculated length/perimeter in square meters (NOT in the units of the CRS of the geometry)

      • getLonLatCoords

        public double[] getLonLatCoords(String wkt,
                                int targetSRID)
        Built-in function that returns a pair of lon/lat coordinates (in WGS84) of a geometry as calculated from its the Well-Known Text representation.
        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the geometry
        targetSRID - the EPSG code of the CRS of this geometry
        Returns:
        An array with the pair of lon/lat coordinates

        g - Input geometry
        Returns:

      • WKT2GeometryTransform

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry WKT2GeometryTransform(String wkt,
                                                                  org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransform transform,
                                                                  com.vividsolutions.jts.io.WKTReader wktReader)
        Provides the internal geometry representation based on its the Well-Known Text, also applying transformation into another CRS (if required).
        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the geometry
        transform - Parameters for the transformation, including source and target CRS
        wktReader - Parser of WKT geometry representations
        Returns:
        The transformed geometry

      • getNextSerial

        public long getNextSerial()
        Provides the next serial number (long) to be used as an intermediate identifier
        Returns:
        A long number.

      • getUUID

        public UUID getUUID(String featureSource,
                    String id)
        Provides a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that represents a 128-bit long value to be used in the URI of a transformed feature. Also known as GUID (Globally Unique Identifier).
        Parameters:
        featureSource - The name of the feature source, to be used as suffix of the identifier.
        id - A unique identifier of the feature.
        Returns:
        The auto-generated UUID based on the concatenation of the feature source and the identifier..

      • getUUID

        public UUID getUUID(String id)
        Provides a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that represents a 128-bit long value to be used in the URI of a transformed feature. Also known as GUID (Globally Unique Identifier).
        Parameters:
        id - A unique identifier of the feature.
        Returns:
        The auto-generated UUID.

      • encodeUTF

        public String encodeUTF(String s,
                        String encoding)
        Provides a UTF-8 encoding of the given string originally represented in the given encoding
        Parameters:
        s - input string value
        encoding - name of the character encoding
        Returns:
        output encoded string

      • getLanguage

        public String getLanguage(String attr,
                          int i)
        Built-in function that extracts the language tag from an attribute name. This tag will be attached to all values obtained for this attribute. ASSUMPTION: The tag is composed from the suffix after the i-th character in the attribute name.
        Parameters:
        attr - The attribute name.
        i - Index of the i-th character in the attribute name.
        Returns:
        The language tag to be applied in string literals created for values from this attribute.

      • getDataSource

        public String getDataSource()
        Built-in function that identifies the provider of the dataset as specified in the configuration settings.
        Returns:
        The name of the data provider.

      • concatenate

        public String concatenate(String val1,
                          String val2)
        Built-in function that concatenates two string values into a new one. TODO: Replace with a more generic function that can concatenate multiple values.
        Parameters:
        val1 - The first value.
        val2 - The second value.
        Returns:
        The concatenated value.

      • applyRuntimeMethod

        public Object applyRuntimeMethod(String methodName,
                                 Object[] args)
        Applies a function at runtime, based on user-defined YML specifications regarding an attribute. This is carried out thanks to the Java Reflection API.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the method to invoke (e.g., getLanguage).
        args - The necessary arguments for the method to run (may be multiple).
        Returns:
        A string value resulting from the invocation (e.g., language tag extracted from the attribute name).
